name: whale oil
description:
• Having read Moby Dick,and played Asteroid, I decided to combine these 2 masterpiece into one game.
  • This is my first game,you may regard it as a remake of the Asteroid,but I'll update this game to a better and more different game when I'm free.(ง •̀_•́)ง
  • Please feel free to leave comments and suggestions! I'll surely read them!!

↑ to accelerate

←/→ to turn left/right

Space to shoot

Whale for 10 score, Oil for 50 score!
